title: Repo Scaffold
desc: Initialize Git. Create folders: `freqtrade/`, `brain/`, `shared_data/`. Create `STANDARDS.md` and `PROGRESS.log`.

title: Docker Infrastructure
desc: Create `docker-compose.yml`. Service `ft_bot` (image: freqtradeorg/freqtrade:stable) and `brain` (python:3.11). Mount `./shared_data` volume to BOTH.

title: Synapse DB
desc: Create `shared_data/init_db.py`. Script to create SQLite DB `signals.db` with table `active_signals` (pair, stop_loss, reason).

title: Sidecar Strategy
desc: Create `freqtrade/user_data/strategies/SidecarStrat.py`. Override `custom_stoploss` method to read `signals.db` for the current pair.

title: Brain Setup
desc: Create `brain/Dockerfile` and `requirements.txt` (streamlit, pandas-ta, ccxt, sqlalchemy, requests, plotly).

title: Data Engine
desc: Create `brain/data.py`. Function `fetch_ohlcv(pair)` using CCXT. Returns DataFrame with standardized columns.

title: Analysis Logic
desc: Create `brain/logic.py`. Function `analyze(df)`. Returns dict: `{'signal': bool, 'reason': str}` based on RSI/EMA.

title: Execution Client
desc: Create `brain/execution.py`. Class with two methods: 1. `stage_signal()` (writes to DB). 2. `trigger_buy()` (calls Freqtrade API).

title: Streamlit Skeleton
desc: Create `brain/app.py`. Setup Layout: Sidebar for settings, Main area with 'Scanner' and 'Monitor' tabs.

title: Connect Logic
desc: Update `app.py`. Add 'Scan' button. Display results from `logic.analyze()` in a dataframe.

title: Connect Execution
desc: Update `app.py`. Add 'Trade' button to rows. Link to `execution.trigger_buy()`.
